info.name: RainLoop
info.description: Simple, modern and fast web-based email client. After enabling in Nextcloud, go to Nextcloud admin panel, "Additionnal settings" and you will see a "Rainloop webmail" section. There, click on the link to go to the Rainloop admin panel. The default user/password is admin/12345. This version is based on Rainloop 1.12.0 (1s of May 2018).
info.author: RainLoop Team and Pierre-Alain Bandinelli
